title: Couture Embroidery Sample, 1930s
medium:
Medium: wool, glass beads, rhinestones
Technique: embroidery on plain weave
description: Purple fabric embroidered with a band in a diaper pattern with hanging loops of beads. Pattern worked in purple, blue and black seed beads and purple rhinestones.

tombstone.epitaph:
Couture Embroidery Sample, 1930s. Medium: wool, glass beads, rhinestones
Technique: embroidery on plain weave. Gift of David Glickman. 1977-81-48.
